description: The Jewel SwitchRadio control lets the user make a single choice within a set of mutually exclusive choices. A SwitchRadio of a lever that can be moved back and forth indicating a binary condition that will be set or unset when the user clicks or touches it. SwitchRadios always appear in groups of two or more with the same groupName property. While they can be individually selected, can only be deselected by selecting a different SwitchRadio in the same group (which deselects the rest of SwitchRadio).
